rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey Rex, do you really believe
that Eden exists?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0002
rows.name:
...Is that even a question?
Of course I do.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0003
rows.name:
Wait, you're following us
without even believing, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0004
rows.name: ...No, that's not what I mean.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0005
rows.name:
I simply wanted to understand
everyone's thoughts on the matter.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0006
rows.name:
Zeke, you've only heard about
Eden through stories, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0007
rows.name: Well, I guess so, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0008
rows.name: The boy saw Eden in his dreams, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0013
rows.name:
It was covered in greenery, warm,
with a beautiful city unlike anything
I've ever seen...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0014
rows.name:
Homura was standing on a hill
overlooking it all.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0015
rows.name:
I think that place is probably Eden...
because there's no place like that
in Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0009
rows.name: The place from your dream, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0010
rows.name:
Should we really believe in Eden's
existence based on such
ambiguous  evidence?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0012
rows.name:
Does that mean you don't trust
me and Homura, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0201
rows.name: No, I do trust you.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0202
rows.name:
I just thought we can't take a world
seen in a dream at face value.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0203
rows.name:
...Tell me, Zeke, have you never
had even the slightest doubt
about Eden's existence?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0204
rows.name:
Well... I can't claim
I've never had my doubts.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0205
rows.name:
To be honest, we won't know whether
Eden exists until we actually get there,
will we?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0206
rows.name: That's true...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0207
rows.name:
But the boy believes it exists.
In that case, I'll just follow along.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0208
rows.name: Zeke...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0209
rows.name:
Sure, it would be great if Eden exists,
but does it really matter if it doesn't?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0210
rows.name:
The boy is charging straight ahead
to fulfill the wishes of someone
important to him.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0211
rows.name:
In that case,
it's my duty to watch over him
until the end.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0212
rows.name: Duty, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0213
rows.name:
What's wrong with that?
Charging after a dream... That's what
being a real man is all about!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0214
rows.name: I see where you're coming from.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0215
rows.name:
Though I'm not quite sure I understand
your notion of a "real man".

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0216
rows.name:
Don't worry, don't worry.
You'll understand it eventually, Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0217
rows.name: After all, Meleph is practically a man.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0218
rows.name:
...Zeke. There are some things
in this world that you shouldn't
joke about.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0223
rows.name: You take your jokes too far.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0219
rows.name:
Perhaps I should teach you
a proper lesson right here and now?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0220
rows.name:
Whoa, Meleph!
Are you actually serious right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0221
rows.name:
Hold on a second!
There's no need to get so upset!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0224
rows.name: Hehehe...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0222
rows.name:
Come on, at least tone down
that killing intent, would you?!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0301
rows.name:
Tell me, Rex.
Do you truly believe that
place was Eden?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0302
rows.name:
True, it's hard to believe that
such a barren, desolate place
is Eden...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0303
rows.name: ...Honestly, I'm not sure myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0304
rows.name:
The place I saw was full of light
and greenery, and incredibly warm.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0305
rows.name:
Then do you think the real
Eden is somewhere else?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0306
rows.name: No... That's definitely the right place.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0307
rows.name:
Despite the lack of greenery and light,
that place was the Eden from my vision...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0308
rows.name:
So are you saying Eden was nothing more
than a fantasy world from your dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0309
rows.name: No, I wouldn't go that far.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0310
rows.name:
It's possible that what Rex saw
was Eden as it existed
in the past...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0311
rows.name: The past?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0312
rows.name:
Yes, the appearance of Eden in the past
that exists in someone's memory...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0313
rows.name:
So you're saying the kid saw that
in his dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0314
rows.name: ...That's pretty bizarre.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0315
rows.name:
Indeed. It's something beyond
most people's comprehension.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0317
rows.name:
If the Eden we found is just a decayed
version of the Eden
from my dream...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0318
rows.name:
Then Alst could end up
like that someday too.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0319
rows.name:
Right. Just like the Iiran Divine Beast
we saw in the Land of Mors. Everything
deteriorates over time, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0320
rows.name:
But this time, it's not about natural
decay. Metsu could turn Alst into
a wasteland like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0321
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0322
rows.name:
If that happens, it would become
a world where neither humans nor even
Divine Beasts could survive.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0323
rows.name:
Then we have to stop
Metsu no matter what!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0324
rows.name: That's the spirit I like to see, boy!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0325
rows.name:
I was worried you'd be dejected about
what Eden turned out to be, but I guess
I shouldn't have been concerned.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0326
rows.name:
Indeed. Rex isn't the type
to be deterred by such setbacks.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0327
rows.name:
That's why we can follow him
with peace of mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0328
rows.name:
W-what's with you two?
Flattery will get you nowhere,
you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0329
rows.name:
Don't mind us.
Just keep being yourself, boy.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0330
rows.name:
Exactly.
Just keep moving forward, Rex.
